trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature tokens equal to the number of differently named lands you control.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature tokens equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

trans-unit.source: {4}{G}{U}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control. They each get +1/+1 until end of turn for each card in your hand.
trans-unit.target: {4}{G}{U}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control. They each get +1/+1 until end of turn for each card in your hand.

trans-unit.resname: PH20·2 | Mountain Mover | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PH20·2 | Mountain Mover | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a Mountain card from outside the game underneath it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a Mountain card from outside the game underneath it.

trans-unit.resname: PH20·2 | Mountain Mover | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, put all cards underneath it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, put all cards underneath it onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: {T}, Say the secret word: Add one mana of any color. Scry 1. You gain 1 life.
